definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian jay (Garrulus glandarius)

sentences.english: And from the wood-top calls the crow, through all the gloomy day.
sentences.chinese: 灌木飛出松鴉，烏鴉在樹冠上叫喚。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, sir, but your wife is as crazy as a jaybird.
sentences.chinese: 我很抱歉，先生，您的妻子瘋狂得就像一隻松鴉。

sentences.english: Of foxes and squirrels and bright jays.
A jay scolds me shrilly from high within the wildly whipping branches of a cedar.
sentences.chinese: 一隻松鴉從一棵正在狂舞的雪松高處尖聲地責備着我。
